name: Emporio Ivankov
text: On Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Play up to 1 (Revolutionary) type Character Card with power 5000 or less. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Play up to 1 (Revolutionary) type Character Card with power 5000 or less. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Card is marked as 'SAMPLE' and has a 'US' rarity, which is likely 'Ultra Rare' or similar. The text is fully legible.
